Class Executor.KernelArgCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • yacx.Executor.KernelArgCreator
  • Enclosing class:
    Executor
    public abstract static class Executor.KernelArgCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for generate KernelArgs with a specific size.
